mapper.sql: id as id, code as code, name as name, parent_id AS "parentId", parent_ids as parentIds, path as path, group_id as groupId, type as type, group_type as groupType, description as description, data_scope as dataScope, DEL_FLAG as delFlag, CRT_BY as crtBy, CRT_TIME as crtTime, UPD_BY as updBy, UPD_TIME as updTime
